messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please put your senors to the maximum, or the CMO will come spanking you all.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We might have HUGE hungry spiders and a bunch of tourists from the clown planet. Please stay safe!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Top Secret Harm Depot Chi's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Top Secret Harm Depot Chi. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
